SEARCH
Package org.opencastproject.serviceregistry.impl.jmx

Interface JobsStatisticsMXBean

All Known Implementing Classes:
JobsStatistics
public interface JobsStatisticsMXBean
JMX Bean interface exposing jobs statistics.
